remarks: Representation of a function in terms of its values.  The converse holds given the law of the excluded middle; as it is we have most of the converse via ~ funmpt and ~ dmmptss .  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 31-Dec-2018.)
statement:
dffn5im $p |- ( F Fn A -> F = ( x e. A |-> ( F ` x ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d F x $.
